title: Tea Time
overview: More than sixty years after leaving high school, former classmates Alicia, Gema, Angelica, Ximena and Maria Teresa are still devoted to their regular catch-ups in which they exchange gossip and reminiscences over elaborately presented afternoon teas. Impeccably turned out, the ladiesâ€™ free-wheeling tea-time chats run the gamut from mortality and marital infidelity to soccer and twerking.
